chapter.text: arrangers u kolonakh
blamers tsykh buty osudzhenyy
reciters povidomlenʹ
Vash boh tilʹky
Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy, ta Lordom skhodu
My prykrasyly naybilʹsh nyzʹki nebesa z prykrashayuchymy planetamy
My pylʹnuvaly tse z kozhnoho z·hubnoho chorta
Vony ne mozhutʹ rozvidnyk na Vysokomu Suspilʹstvi; vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ bombarded z kozhnoyi storony
Vony buly zasudzheni; vony zaznaly vichnoho retribution
Yakshcho budʹ-yaki yim pidpryyemstva zvynuvatyty zovnishni mezhi, vin pryyizhdzhaye ukladenyy z zhorstokyy projectile
Prosyatʹ yikh, vony bilʹshe tyazhki stvoryuyutʹ, abo inshi stvorennya?" My utvoryly yikh z volohoyi hryazyuky
V toy chas, yak vy awed, vony vysmiyuyutʹ
Koly nahadaly, vony ne berutʹ uvahu
Koly vony bachatʹ dokaz, vony ridicule tse
Yak kazhutʹ, "Tse ye ochevydno mahichne
Pislya my vmyrayemo ta stayemo pylom ta kistkamy, my pryyizhdzhayemo resurrected
Rivni nashi starovynni predky
Kazhete, "Tak, vy budete forcibly sklykatysya
Vse tse bere nudge, whereupon vony (vstayutʹ) dyvlyatʹsya
Vony skazhutʹ, "Prykroshchi do nas; tse yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Vyroku
Tse yavlyaye soboyu denʹ rishennya shcho vy vykorystaly disbelieve
Sklykayutʹ porushnykiv, ta yikhnye podruzhzhya, ta idoly vony obozhnyuvaly
bilya BOHA, ta keruyutʹ nymy do shlyakhu Pekla
Zupynyayutʹ yikh, ta prosyatʹ yikh
Chomu vy ne dopomahayete odyn odnym
Vony budutʹ, na shcho denʹ, povnistyu podayuchyy
Vony prybudutʹ odyn odnoho, dopytuyuchy ta osudzhuyuchi odyn odnym
Vony skazhutʹ (do yikhnikh lideriv), "Vy zvychayno prybuvaly do nas z prava storona
Vony vidpovidutʹ, "Tse - vy shcho ne viruyuchi
My nikoly ne maly budʹ-yakyy enerhetychnyy nad vamy; tse - vy shcho buly bezputni
My spravedlyvo zaznaly nashoho vyroku Lorda; zaraz my povynni postrazhdaty
My pryzvely do pomylky vy, tilʹky tomu, shcho my astray
Otzhe, razom vony budutʹ vsi berutʹ uchastʹ retribution na tomu dni
Tse yak my requite vynuvati
Koly vony buly kazani, "Laa Elaaha Ella Allakh [Nemaye inshoho boha bilya BOHA]," vony povernulysya zukhvali
Vony skazaly, my 'Budemo lyshyty nashykh bohiv zarady bozhevilʹnoho poeta
Faktychno, vin prynis pravdu, ta pidtverdyv kur'yeriv
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vy pokushtuyete naybilʹsh bolisnyy retribution
Vy requited tilʹky za shcho vy zrobyly
Tilʹky BOZHI sluzhbovtsi shcho absolyutno prysvyachuyutʹsya yomu vyklyuchno (budutʹ ryatuvatysya)
Vony zasluzhyly umovy shcho rezervuyutʹsya spetsialʹno dlya nykh
Vsi riznovydy fruktiv. Vony budutʹ shanuvatysya
U parku blazhenstva
Na vbranni blyzʹko do odyn odnym
Chashky chystykh napoyu budutʹ proponuvatysya yim
Yasnyy ta duzhe smachnyy dlya drinkers
Nikoly ne zabrudnyuvav, ta nikoly ne vysnazhenyy
Z nymy budutʹ dyvovyzhni kompanyony
Zakhyshchenyy lyublyatʹ lamki yaytse
Vony prybudutʹ odyn odnoho, ta prysudzhuyutʹ z odyn odnym
Odyn z nykh skazhu, "ya zvychayno mav tovarysha
Vin zvychayno vysmiyuvav: `do vy vvazhayete vse tse
after my vmyrayemo ta obih u pyl ta kistky, my pryyizhdzhayemo poklykani do vidpovidi
Vin skazhe, "Tilʹky berutʹ pohlyad
Koly vin dyvytʹsya, vin pobachytʹ yoho tovarysha u sertsi Pekla
Vin (poyide yomu ta) kazhete, BOHOM, vy mayzhe zruynuvaly meni
Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya moho Lorda blahoslovennya, ya by z vamy zaraz
(Robyte vas dosi vvazhayete) shcho my vmyrayemo
tilʹky persha smertʹ, ta my nikoly ne otrymuyemo budʹ-yakyy requital
Takyy yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy triumf
Tse ye shcho kozhnyy robitnyk musytʹ popratsyuvaty
tse krashcha dolya, abo derevo bitterness
My nadaly tse pokarannya dlya porushnykiv
Tse - derevo shcho roste u sertsi Pekla
Yoho kvity budutʹ skhozhi na chortamy holovy
Vony z'yidyatʹ z tse do yikhnikh shlunkiv zapovnyuyutʹsya
Todi vony budutʹ vershyna tse z hellish napoyim
Todi vony povernutʹsya do Didʹka
Vony znayshly yikhnikh batʹkiv astray
Ta vony slipo proslidkuvaly u yikhnikh krokakh
Bilʹshistʹ poperednikh heneratsiy zbylysya z shlyakhu u tomu zhe sposobi
My poslaly yim warners
Prymitka naslidky dlya tsykh khto buly poperedzhenyy
Tilʹky BOZHI sluzhbovtsi shcho absolyutno prysvyachuyutʹsya yomu vyklyuchno (ryatuyutʹsya)
Otzhe, Noah zaklykanyy na nas, ta my yavlyaly soboyu krashchyy responders
My vryatuvaly yoho ta yoho rodynu z velykoho lykha
My zrobyly yoho kompanyonam zhyvi
Ta my zberehly yoho istoriyu dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy
Myr budutʹ na Noah sered narodiv
My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo spravedlyvyy
Vin ye odyn z nashoho viryachoho sluzhbovtsyam
My potonuly vsi inshi
Sered yoho poslidovnykiv Abraham
Vin prybuv do yoho Lorda wholeheartedly
Vin skazav yoho batʹkovi ta yoho lyudyam, "Yaki vy obozhnyuyete
tse tsi vyhotovleni bohy, zamistʹ BOHA, shcho vy zakhochete
Shcho vy dumayete Lorda vsesvitu
Vin podyvyvsya oberezhno u zirkakh
Todi vin vidmovyvsya vid ta skazav, "ya ye vtomlen tse
Vony prohnaly z yoho
Vin todi vklyuchyv yikhnikh idoliv, kazhuchy, "Chy ne mohly b vy lyubyty z'yisty
Chomu vy ne rozmovlyayete
Vin todi zruynuvav yikh
Vony poyikhaly yomu u velykyy rage
Vin skazav, "Yak vy mozhete obozhnyuvaty shcho vy vyrizayete
Koly BOH utvoryv vas, ta vse vy robyte
Vony skazaly, "Dozvolyayutʹ nam buduyutʹ velykyy vohonʹ, ta kydayutʹ yoho u tse
Vony zamyslyly proty yoho, ale my zrobyly yim losers
Vin skazav, "ya zbyrayusya miy Lord; Vin bude keruvaty meni
Miy Lord, harantuyutʹ meni spravedlyvi dity
My daly yomu harnu novynu harnoyi dytyny

Koly vin vyris dosytʹ popratsyuvaty z nym, vin skazav, "Miy syn, ya dyvlyusya u mriyi shcho ya zhertvuyu vamy. Shcho vy dumayete?" Vin skazav, "O miy batʹko, robyte shcho vy nakazuyetesʹ shchob zrobyty. Vy znaydete meni, BOH bazhayuchyy, patsiyent
Vony i podayutʹsya, i vin stavyv yoho cholo vnyz (shchob pozhertvuvaty yo)
My zaklykaly yoho: "O Abraham
Vy poviryly mriyi." My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo spravedlyvyy
Shcho buv exacting test diysno
My ransomed (Ismail) zaminyayuchy tvarynu zhertvuyemo
Ta my zberehly yoho istoriyu dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy
Myr budutʹ na Abraham
My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo spravedlyvyy
Vin ye odyn z nashoho viryachoho sluzhbovtsyam
Todi my daly yomu harnu novynu pro narodzhennya Isaac, shchob buty odni z spravedlyvykh prorokiv
My blahoslovyly yoho ta Isaac. Sered yikhnikh nashchadkiv, deyakykh spravedlyvi, ta deyakyy bezputni porushnyky
My takozh blahoslovyly Moses ta Aaron
My dostavyly yim ta yikhnim lyudyam z velykoho lykha
My pidtrymaly yikh, do vony staly peremozhtsyamy
My daly obydva z nykh hlyboke svyate pysannya
My keruvaly nymy u pravi shlyakh
My zberehly yikhnyu istoriyu dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy
Myr budutʹ na Moses ta Aaron
My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo spravedlyvyy
Obydva z nykh sered nashykh spravedlyvykh sluzhbovtsiv
Elias buv odyn z kur'yeriv
Vin skazav yoho lyudyam, "Chy ne mohly b vy ne popratsyuvaty righteousness
vy obozhnyuyete statuyu, zamistʹ Vyshchoho Creator
BOH; vash Lord, ta Lord vashoho forefathers
Vony disbelieved yo. Otzhe, vony povynni buty poklykani do vidpovidi
Tilʹky BOZHI sluzhbovtsi shcho absolyutno prysvyachuyutʹsya yomu vyklyuchno (ryatuyutʹsya)
My zberehly yoho istoriyu dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy
Myr budutʹ na Elias, ta vesʹ tsey lyublyatʹ Elias
My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo spravedlyvyy
Vin buv odyn z nashoho viryachoho sluzhbovtsyam
Dolya bula odna z kur'yeriv
My vryatuvaly yoho ta vsyu yoho rodynu
Tilʹky stara zhinka pryrikalasʹ
My vynyshchyly vsikh inshi
Vy dosi prokhodyte povz yikhni ruyiny dnem
Ta nichchyu. Chy ne mohly b vy zrozumity
Jonah buv odyn z kur'yeriv
Vin vtik do navantazhenoho korablya
Vin povstav ta otzhe, vin pryyednavsya losers
Otzhe, ryba kovtnula yoho, ta vin yavlyav soboyu osudyty
Yakshcho tse ne shcho vin vdavsya do mirkuvannya (na Bohu)
vin by zalyshyvsya u yoho shlunku do Dnya Resurrection
My maly yoho kynuly u pustelyu, vysnazhenu
My maly derevo yistivnoho plodu vyroshchenoho dlya nʹoho
Todi my poslaly yomu do sta tysyachi, abo bilʹshe
Vony vvazhaly, ta my dozvolyayemo yim polyublyayemo tse zhyttya
Prosyatʹ yikh yakshcho vash Lord mayutʹ dochok, v toy chas, yak vony mayutʹ syniv
my utvoryly anhely buty zhinky? Vony svidok shcho
Diysno, vony velyko blaspheme koly yak kazhutʹ
BOH begotten syn." Diysno, vony brekhuny
Vin vybrav divchyn nad khlopchykamy
Shcho nepravylʹnyy z vashoyu lohikoyu
Chomu vy ne berete uvahu
vy mayete budʹ-yakyy dokaz
Pokazuyete nam vashu knyhu, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Vony navitʹ vynayshly spetsialʹne spivvidnoshennya mizh Yo ta jinns. jinns sebe znayutʹ shcho vony ye spryyatlyvi
BOH glorified; daleko nahori yikhniy vymahaye
Tilʹky BOZHI sluzhbovtsi shcho prysvyachuyutʹsya yomu vyklyuchno (ryatuyutʹsya)
Diysno, vy ta shcho vy obozhnyuyete
Ne mozhe nav'yazaty budʹ shcho na Yo
Tilʹky vy spalyte u Pekli
Kozhnyy odyn z nas maye spetsyfichnu robotu
My yavlyayemo soboyu arrangers
My vchasno glorified (nash Lord)
Vony zvychayno kazaly
Maly my otrymaly pravylʹni instruktsiyi z nashykh batʹkiv
my by worshipers; prysvyachenyy do BOHA yedynoho
Ale vony disbelieved, ta vony bezsumnivno znaydutʹ
Nashe rishennya vzhe ukhvalyuyetʹsya dlya nashykh sluzhbovtsiv kur'yery
Vony perekonuyutʹsya peremozhtsi
Nashi soldaty yavlyayutʹ soboyu peremozhtsiv
Tak disregard yim dlya deyakoho chasu
Sposterihayutʹ yikh; vony nadto budutʹ sposterihaty
vony vyklyk nash retribution
Koly yomu udaryaye yikh odyn denʹ, tse bude neshchasnyy denʹ; vony dostatno buly poperedzheni
Disregard yim dlya deyakoho chasu
Sposterihayutʹ yikh; vony nadto budutʹ sposterihaty
Slava musytʹ vash Lord, velykyy Lord; daleko nahori yikhniy vymahaye
Myr budutʹ na kur'yeriv
Pokhvala musytʹ BOH, Lord vsesvitu
